name: riddle_0
description: The more you take, the more you leave behind, what am i?

name: riddle_1
description: what has a head, a tail, is brown but has no legs?

name: riddle_2
description: what has many keys, but can't even open a single door?

name: riddle_3
description: what belongs to you, but other people use it more than you?

name: riddle_4
description: Tall I am young, Short I am old, While with life I glow, Wind is my foe. What am I?

name: riddle_5
description: What is more useful when it is broken?

name: riddle_6
description: What has six faces, But does not wear makeup. It also has twenty-one eyes, But cannot see?

name: riddle_7
description: Before Mount Everest was discovered, what was the highest mountain on Earth?

name: riddle_8
description: What runs around the whole yard without moving?

name: riddle_9
description: What 7 letter word is spelled the same way backwards and forewords?

name: riddle_10
description: You use a knife to slice my head and weep beside me when I am dead. What am i?
